value.title: New way to Upload File from Power BI Workspace
value.excerpt: In this short video, let's talk about new way to upload files from Power BI Workspace. In the workspace you want to add files to, you’ll see an Upload option next to the New button. You’ll be able to use this dropdown to connect to files stored in OneDrive for Business or any SharePoint site you have

value.title: Page and Bookmark Navigator in Power BI
value.excerpt: This video demonstrates how we can add Page Navigator and Bookmark navigator in Power BI. This is my favorite feature rolled out from Power BI November 2021 update! value.title: Reminder - Install WebView2 to Get Latest Updates from Power BI Desktop
